messages.content: In just a few days you’ll have the chance to vote in the most important general election for a generation. When you’re standing in the polling booth with the pencil in your hand, think about the kind of country you want Britain to be.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: If you want a country that has an economy that works for everyone where enterprise is rewarded, vote for change.
If you want a country with a strong society, where families and pensioners are supported, where responsible behaviour is rewarded, vote for change.
If you want a country where people have more power over their lives, where the size and cost of Parliament is cut and it’s the people who call the shots, vote for change.

issues.economy: If you want a country that has an economy that works for everyone where enterprise is rewarded, vote for change.
issues.governance: If you want a country where people have more power over their lives, where the size and cost of Parliament is cut and it’s the people who call the shots, vote for change.
issues.socialWelfare: If you want a country with a strong society, where families and pensioners are supported, where responsible behaviour is rewarded, vote for change.

quotes.text: We urgently need to make these changes so that Britain can move forward. We cannot afford to wait any longer.
This is a crucial time in the history of our country and the choice at this election is clear: five more years of Gordon Brown or change with the Conservatives.
